RACIAL_ATTRIBUTES.RACIAL_BONUS: Can rise to any level in chosen class.

NAME.FULL: Anosmia (loss of the sense of taste)
Delusional (Major): Character thinks he is an animal and behaves like one.
Delusional (Minor): Character thinks animals are people and talks to them.
Delusional (Major): Character thinks he can fly, and often tries.
Delusional (Minor): Character thinks other people can fly and often asks them to.
Delusional (Major): Character thinks he is royalty and acts like it.
Delusional (Minor): Character thinks one of the party members is royalty and treats him as such.
Delusional (Major): Character thinks he is in the middle of battle when he is not.
Delusional (Minor): Character thinks he is a war hero and brags accomplishments that aren't his.
Delusional (Major): Character thinks his party members are monsters.
Delusional (Minor): Character thinks bugs are crawling on himslef and those around him.
Delusional (Major): Character thinks scaled monsters are his friends and treats them as such.
Delusional (Minor): Character talks to an imaginary friend.
Delusional (Major): Character thinks screaming will scare away monsters.
Delusional (Minor): Character thinks a monster is following him.
Delusional (Major): Character thinks he is invisible.
Delusional (Minor): Character thinks his eyes are tricking him so he is constantly asking others wha
Delusional (Major): Character thinks he can walk on water.
Delusional (Minor): Character thinks water is poisonous.
Delusional (Major): Character thinks he can tame monsters, and tries.
Delusional (Minor): Character thinks he has a tame monster for a pet.
Compulsion to kiss members of opposite sex.
Compulsion to gather as much gold as possible.
Compulsion to srub and brush horses.
Compulsion to own as many weapons as possible.
Compulsion to own as much armor as possible.
Compulsion to accumulate as many magical items as possible.
Compulsion to star at the sun.
Compulsion to discover source of unusual or unknown sounds.sounds
Compulsion to accumulate as many books or scrolls as possible.
Compulsion to accumulate as many jewels as possible.
Compulsion to discover source of any odd odors.
Superstitious: Thinks the Wurld is flat.
Superstitious: Thinks being near dead things is unlucky.
Superstitious: He has an unlucky number.
Superstitious: Has a magic charm that he believes protects him.
